input: ingredients:  '4 chicken breasts', '1 small pkg. chopped broccoli', '1 can cream of chicken soup', '1 small carton sour cream', '3/4 stick oleo, melted', 'grated cheese, as desired',<sep> directions: 'Boil chicken until tender.', 'Cool and break into bite-sized pieces.', 'Place broccoli in baking dish.', 'Cook in microwave about 5 minutes.', 'Arrange chicken on top.', 'Pour on melted oleo, then half of the grated cheese.', 'Mix together sour cream and soup (will be thick).', 'Spoon over chicken and top with remaining cheese.', 'Bake at 350° for about 45 minutes.', 'Serve over rice.'

ingredients:  '1 c. butter or margarine', '1/2 c. sugar', '1 tsp. vanilla', '1/2 c. crushed potato chips', '1/2 c. chopped pecans', '2 c. sifted flour',<sep> directions: 'Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla.', 'Add crushed potato chips and pecans.', 'Stir in flour.', 'Roll into small balls.', 'Place on ungreased cookie sheet and press ball flat with bottom of tumbler dipped in sugar.', 'Bake at 350° for 16 to 18 minutes or until lightly browned.', 'Makes 3 dozen cookies.'

ingredients:  '2 qt. water', '1/2 cup uncooked long-grain white rice', '2 Mexican cinnamon sticks*', '1 cup sugar',<sep> directions: 'Bring 2 qt. water and next 2 ingredients to a boil in a 3 1/2-qt. saucepan over medium heat; cook 25 minutes or until rice is tender. Let cool to room temperature. Remove cinnamon sticks.', 'Puree rice mixture, in batches, in a blender until smooth. Pour mixture into a pitcher; stir in sugar and enough water to equal 2 qt. Chill; serve over ice.', '*Regular cinnamon sticks may be substituted.'
